resources.string: I am a tech enthusiast with a slight twist in the perspective with which I perceive live. Love to live, I live to love food, tech, books and people.
I am an tech enthusiast who believes that developers and engineers have super powers (skills) through which they can transform this world into an peaceful place. #developer_powers

[The Location does not change]
There are two key players to this issue 
 1. Your internet connection make sure that you have active ,fast and robust Data connection
 2. Your bus driver activates location service everyday before he starts the bus. Failing to do so May lead to this issue . Remind your driver about this he will handle the rest.

[The app crashes]
 Please send your android device details to developerhyder@gmail.com We will take care of the bug in the next update.

[I have an Idea to improvise the app]
 New Ideas are always welcomed make sure that you dont add unicorns to them. You can mail them to developerhyder@gmail.com we will do all that there is to bring that idea to life.

[Not satisfied with the apps performance]
You can clear cache and restart the app. That should do the trick


Furthermore new Updates are always available.
